author: wsjcom
title: Lyft’s Jill Wetzler on the Challenge That Keeps Her Up
text: “Scale is the No. 1 thing that keeps me up at night. Last year, we averaged over a million rides per day. And that was more than double what we did in 2016. All of our infrastructure has to be prepared to scale for this incredible growth. On top of that, we have to be able to scale with really unpredictable traffic patterns. There’s sort of the predictable, spiky traffic that we have around commute hours or weekends, when people are going out. But then there’s also this sort of unpredictable, spiky traffic that happens when there are interesting weather patterns or other things that catch us by surprise. Our systems have...
